member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.NotesController.CreateNote(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send file to server, currently only pdf supported. Please send this as form-data

member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.NotesController.DownloadRequest(System.Guid)
member.summary: Try to download the file, if user has bought note then the response is file itself (blob file result). Every browser should be able to open this blob file and it stays in memory while user session is on. If user hasn't bought the file, then the response is bad request OR (in future) auto-redirect to homepage.

member.name: M:Projekcik.Api.Controllers.UniController.GetAll
